name: OSX-Dock-Location
tagline: this is an applescript and app that ckecks wether a new screen/ display has been attached and asks for repositioning of your dock
body:
![screenshot](https://raw.github.com/AndreBaumeier/osx-dock-location/master/screenshot.png)

docklocation.app is located under bin/

source is in source/docklocation.applescript

if you want to compile it yourself:
```terminal
osacompile -s -o docklocation.app docklocation.applescript
open docklocation.app
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
